resources.resource: Please wait while the screenshot is uploaded to your FogBugz instance.

Your account configuration is invalid or hasn't been configured. Please configure your account settings by clicking EDIT > PREFERENCES and selecting the PLUGIN tab. Click on the FogBugz entry and then click configure.
Please enter a case Id to attach the screenshot to. If you wish to generate a new case, leave the the Id as 0 and click ok.
